name: Dragon Princess Anastasia
description:
*All characters are aged above 18.
[Black-and-White Short Comedy RPG]
Tons of trouble caused by the dumb dragon princess!?
Search for treasures hidden inside the cave!
Overview
"Anastasia", the dragon princess,
struggles hard in order to save her dragon race, but...
Where can she be going now...!?
Systems
・Basic turn-based RPG
・Search caves for hidden treasures!
・Simple tactic system easy for RPG beginners to understand!
